sentences.en: A small mallet used by auctioneers.
sentences.cn: 拍卖锤拍卖者所用的小锤.

sentences.en: Drop that mallet and bring the thrill of the arcade everywhere with EA Air Hockey!
sentences.cn: EA这款曲棍球桌台为你带来随时随地的享受兴奋的经典竞赛游戏!

sentences.en: He hit the peg mightily on the top with a mallet.
He stares me down , wielding his bronze mallet , ho , chasing me off in his fierce voice.
sentences.cn: 彼瞋目而扬锤兮厉声以逐余 ﹒.

sentences.en: Hold this mallet half moon shape, not hold tightly.
sentences.cn: 这槌的拿法是拿半月形的, 不能都整个抓握.

sentences.en: I even have a wooden mallet that was used by a judge over 300 years ago during condemnation proceedings in Salem.
sentences.cn: 我甚至还有一把300多年前的木槌。

sentences.en: Slight tapping with a mallet may be required, but do not change the valve stem position.
sentences.cn: 如果需要,用木槌轻轻敲打, 但是不要改变阀杆位置.

sentences.en: Slight tapping with a mallet may be required.
sentences.cn: 如果需要用木槌轻轻敲打.

sentences.en: Sounds solid : made by the mallet of Los Demiurgos.
sentences.cn: 听上去蛮实,一定是巨匠造物主那把木槌的响声.

sentences.en: Take the plough thethe mallet the lute.
sentences.cn: 带上耕犁,带上炼炉,带上木槌,带上诗琴.

sentences.en: The 29 th minute, Cologne middle place Antar meets a corner kick mallet to hit the crossbeam.
sentences.cn: 第29分钟, 科隆中场安塔尔就接角球头槌击中横梁.

sentences.en: The difference was all in the imagination behind the hands that wielded mallet and chisel.
sentences.cn: 两双同样挥动着槌子和凿子的手后面隐含着截然不同的思想.

sentences.en: The drummer was worried because his mallet was missing one minute before the concert.
sentences.cn: 鼓手很著急,因为他的小音槌在音乐会开始前一分钟不见了.

sentences.en: The water-filled bowls, when rubbed with a leather-wrapped mallet, exhibit a lively dance of water droplets as they emit a haunting sound.
sentences.cn: 在用皮革包裹的木槌摩擦倒满水的碗时，碗里的水滴会跳起生动的舞蹈，同时它们发出萦绕不绝的声音。

sentences.en: Then he hammered on the door, using his fist as if they were mallet.
sentences.cn: 然后他用他的拳头敲门, 就像用大头锤一样.

sentences.en: When thrusting with the mallet, press the head with the finger, then thrust forward.
sentences.cn: 刺槌购乐学的时候, 食指要压在槌购乐学的前面, 然后向前杀出.

sentences.en: When thrusting with the mallet, press the head with the index finger, then thrust forward.
sentences.cn: 刺槌的时候, 食指要压在槌的前面, 然后向前杀出.

trans.tran_en: a wooden hammer with a large end
